text: Michael Vincent Lee (born November 29, 1968) is a former Republican member of the North Carolina State Senate. Lee was first appointed to office in August 2014 replacing Thom Goolsby. He was re-elected at the November 2016 election for a second term, having defeated Democrat Andrew Barnhill 57.35% to 42.65%. Lee holds a bachelor's degree from the University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill and a law degree from Wake Forest University. As a lawyer, Lee started his own law firm in 2012.Lee Law Firm Entry ==References== ==External links== *State Senate biography page *Vote Smart bio of Lee Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:North Carolina state senators Category:North Carolina Republicans Category:University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill alumni Category:Wake Forest University alumni Category:North Carolina lawyers
title: Michael V. Lee
